divs: sighting detailsmy daughter called from work about 1\2 mile away and said she thought she saw a ufo hovering and asked me to go out and look. from our 4th floor parking garage i soon saw a very large, silent airplane leaving no trail nor noise until it passed westward and thought that may have been what she had seen. i decided to go to the ground level and search upward . . . there were 4 or 5 airplanes circling and then i saw this large shiny orb higher up than any of the airplanes in the exact location my daughter described. a plane landed at a nearby airport, others kept circling and the ufo hovered in the one location for a number of minutes, then started to glide se. as i remembered i had my camera, i looked down for a second, turned it on and when i looked back up it was nowhere in site. i waited a few minutes and it did not reappear. it was visible for 15-20 minutes at least. it was over and se of broomfield and perhaps over western westminster, co as well.
Summary: Brightly shining, hovering, silent orb that would go horizontal and vertical
